name: brabg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, c4, c2), w0))
